name: Mechanists
description:
This is what it looks like when someone below-average competence tries to make a 3D Arcanists ripoff in the span of 2 weeks.

Each player has 3 Mechs, the goal is to blow the other players' Mechs away. The action is split into rounds.

Supports up to 4 players at a time. Some of them can be set to computer-controlled, but the AI sucks.

I didn't make most of the sound effects, which were courtesy of good 'ol FreeSFX.co.uk (Series 6000 Extension I, Series 6000 Extension III, Series 6000 Extension V, Crash & Burn, Series 1000 General).
